subject.geographic: The Great Depression and World War II (1929-1945).

mods.note: This is a student paper published by the students of Dickson Central High School, called the Central Star. Included are two distinct essays. "In 1950" is a projection into the future, in which the author believes there will be robots, flying cars and boats, instantaneous mail delivery, etc. "On poverty" is an essay which discusses the nature of poverty, and suggests that wealth can mean different things to different people depending on their circumstances. Pages include advertisements at bottom.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
